title: Fool's Gold
description: THE DIAMOND SERIES, BOOK 2Christmas in FreewillChristmas Eve, the Diamond Saloon is empty of its people, and Pearl la Monte has a hankering to retire early. A pounding at the door rids her of such a fool notion. Her irritation rises when she sees the prissy, polite-like Garrett standing outside.Ethan Garrett has a powerful need to gain succor. When the saloon's voluptuous redheaded singer scowls at him from the threshold of the Diamond, he doesn't stop to think on how his ire at her has disappeared. Or how he just wants to spend some time in her company.When a blizzard storms in, trapping them, will they spend their time arguing or discover their irritation disguises something more?If you like this, you might like Book 1, ROUGH DIAMOND
author: Cassandra Dean
